unnormalised: Arrey bhai, lagan-a "The Grand Plaza, Ballroom A, Andheri (E), Mumbai, 400069" ao na? Mithiga se dami! Aasa khalamo didi bisor gari thowni jaman khab, nangthaba plot nombor 7-ao jilaphi janai nagirou!
normalised: Aih dada, lagunwiya "Da Gran Plaja, Balrum E, Andheri (E), Mumbai, brwi laak jiro jiro jeid gwini" aw dongo? Nwjwra mwnja nwngao! Asa khalamo, bisorni gaari galangnai ni subidha gajon dongo, nongblaba plot nombor snwi aw akal biyal gajon!
text: Arrey bhai, lagan-a "The Grand Plaza, Ballroom A, Andheri (E), Mumbai, 400069" ao na? Mithiga se dami! Aasa khalamo didi bisor gari thowni jaman khab, nangthaba plot nombor 7-ao jilaphi janai nagirou!
